title: PSTAT 120B: Mathematical Statistics, I
text:
InstructorTeaching Assistants


INSTRUCTOR: Ethan P. Marzban (He/Him)

Hello! My name is Ethan P. Marzban (he/him), and I’m currently a PhD student in the Department of Statistics here at UCSB. My research interests span a variety of topics, including mathematical statistics, Bayesian statistics, and Stats/Data Science Education. In my free time, I enjoy playing the piano, drinking boba, and talking about cats. I’m super excited to be your instructor this quarter!

title: PSTAT 120B: Mathematical Statistics, I
text:
PSTAT 120B: Mathematical Statistics, I


Summer Session A, 2024  Instructor: Ethan P. Marzban



Welcome to the course site for the Summer Session A iteration of PSTAT 120B: Mathematical Statistics, with Ethan P. Marzban! Here, you will find all material associated with the course. Feel free to use this material however you like; just please include attribution to me (Ethan).


Click Here to access the course site for the iteration of PSTAT 120A I taught a few years back (Summer 2022).
